summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to nondiscrimination by those providing goods or services to the City's Fair Employment Practices Ordinance (Ordinance 109116); amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 20.44.010, 20.44.020, 20.44.030, 20.44.040, 20.44.050, and 20.44.100 (Sections 1, 2, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, and 7 of Ordinance 101432).
